blocks.text: Threats come in various forms, each targeting different aspects of security:

items: Malware: software designed to harm (e.g., ransomware, spyware).
Social engineering: manipulating people (e.g., phishing, pretexting).
Application attacks: targeting apps/APIs (e.g., SQL injection, XSS).
Network attacks: disrupting or intercepting traffic (e.g., DoS, on-path attacks).
